caption.p: Antioxidant activity of pasta enriched with SFP, determined with ORAC assay during in vitro gastric and pancreatic phase of digestion and before digestion. Results are expressed as Trolox (µmol g −1). Data are mean ± SD ( n = 3), followed by small (before digestion), capital (gastric), and small underlined (pancreatic digestion) letters indicate significant difference among the values at p < 0.05.
